terms.heading: Gratuity is not included in the fares. If you'd like to tip your driver, it would be highly appreciated. You have the following options to do so:
children: Pay in cash, Venmo, or Zelle (which drivers prefer).
Text your driver the dollar amount or percentage you wish to add to your reservation.
You can tip your driver during your booking.

terms.heading: HELLO SHUTTLE does not add any taxes to our fares. The fare you pay is solely based on the total number of passengers you have entered.
***Rates are lower during non traffic hours ***
We provide a Private Non-Stop Service, we pick-up and drop-off right in front of your terminal
